named-query.name: queryWindowById
named-query.query: SELECT w FROM ADWindow w WHERE w.aDWindowID = :adWindowId

named-query.name: queryTabsByWindowId
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM ADTab t WHERE t.aDWindowID = :adWindowId ORDER BY t.seqNo

named-query.name: queryFieldsByTabId
named-query.query: SELECT f FROM ADField f WHERE f.aDTabID = :adTabId

named-query.name: queryTabvsByWindowId
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM AdTabV t WHERE t.aDWindowID = :adWindowId ORDER BY t.seqNo

named-query.name: queryFormByLanguage
named-query.query: SELECT f FROM ADFormVt f WHERE f.aDLanguageID = :aDLanguageID AND t.aDFormID = :adFormId

named-query.name: queryTabVTrlsByWindowId
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM AdTabVt t WHERE t.aDLanguageID = :aDLanguageID AND t.aDWindowID = :adWindowId ORDER BY t.seqNo

named-query.name: queryFieldvsByTabId
named-query.query: SELECT f FROM AdFieldV f WHERE f.aDTabID = :adTabId ORDER BY f.seqNo

named-query.name: queryFieldVTrlsByTabId
named-query.query: SELECT f FROM AdFieldVt f WHERE f.aDTabID = :adTabId AND f.aDLanguageID = :aDLanguageID ORDER BY f.seqNo

named-query.name: queryMenuNodes
named-query.query: SELECT m FROM ADMenu m ORDER BY m.parentID, m.seqNo

named-query.name: queryMenuByLanguage
named-query.query: SELECT m FROM ADMenuVt m WHERE m.aDLanguageID = :aDLanguageID ORDER BY m.parentID, m.seqNo

named-query.name: queryRefList
named-query.query: SELECT NEW org.adempiere.common.LookupValue(r.value, r.name) FROM ADRefList r WHERE r.aDReferenceID = :adReferenceId

named-query.name: queryRefTable
named-query.query: SELECT NEW org.adempiere.common.RefCriteria(r.aDTable.tableName, r.keyColumn.propertyName, r.displayColumn.propertyName, r.valueDisplayed, r.orderByClause, r.whereClause) FROM ADRefTable r WHERE r.aDReferenceID = :adReferenceId

named-query.name: queryProcessWithParamsByProcessId
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM ADProcess p LEFT JOIN FETCH p.aDProcessParas WHERE p.aDProcessID = :adProcessId

named-query.name: queryProcessTrlWithParamsByProcessId
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM ADProcessVt p LEFT JOIN FETCH p.aDProcessParaVts WHERE p.aDLanguageID = :aDLanguageID AND p.aDProcessID = :aDProcessId

named-query.name: queryTableByTableName
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM ADTable t WHERE t.tableName = :tablename

named-query.name: queryElementByColumn
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM ADElement e WHERE LOWER(e.columnName) = :columnname

named-query.name: queryColumnsByTable
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM ADColumn c WHERE c.aDTableID = :adTableId

named-query.name: queryTranslateTable
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT NEW org.adempiere.model.ADTable(f.aDTableID, f.tableName) FROM AdFieldV f WHERE f.translated=true

named-query.name: queryUnMappedColumns
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM ADColumn c WHERE c.aDTableID = :adTableId AND c.active = true AND NOT (c.name LIKE 'Created%' OR c.name LIKE 'Updated%') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT f.aDFieldID FROM ADField f WHERE f.aDColumnID=c.aDColumnID AND f.aDTabID= :adTabId)

named-query.name: querySeqByTabId
named-query.query: SELECT NEW org.adempiere.web.client.model.SequenceModel(f.aDFieldID, f.name, f.seqNo) FROM ADField f WHERE f.aDTabID = :adTabId ORDER BY f.seqNo

named-query.name: queryRootNodes
named-query.query: SELECT n FROM ADTreeBar b JOIN b.nodes n WHERE b.aDTreeID = :adTreeId AND b.aDUserID = :adUserId

named-query.name: querySubNodes
named-query.query: SELECT n FROM ADTreeNode n WHERE n.parentID = :parentId ORDER BY n.parentID, n.seqNo

named-query.name: queryIdColumnsByTable
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT NEW org.adempiere.common.IdentifierColumn(f.aDColumnID, f.columnName, f.propertyName) FROM AdFieldV f WHERE f.identifier=true AND LOWER(f.tableName)=:tableName ORDER BY f.aDColumnID

named-query.name: queryUserByName
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM ADUser u JOIN FETCH u.aDUserRoles WHERE u.name=:name

named-query.name: queryFormAccessByRole
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM ADFormAccess a WHERE a.aDRoleID=:aDRoleID

named-query.name: queryProcessAccessByRole
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM ADProcessAccess a WHERE a.aDRoleID=:aDRoleID

named-query.name: queryWindowAccessByRole
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM ADWindowAccess a WHERE a.aDRoleID=:aDRoleID

named-query.name: queryWorkflowAccessByRole
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM ADWorkflowAccess a WHERE a.aDRoleID=:aDRoleID
